publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3370 Paul Martin: Policy Advice on Glasgow in the Post Second World War Period—That the Parliament notes with concern the poor policy advice relating to Glasgow provided by Scottish Office advisers during the period after the second world war and calls on the Scottish Executive to take steps to ensure that the recommendations of the cities review will act as a means towards continuing to develop an ambitious and vibrant Glasgow.
S1M-3370 Policy Advice on Glasgow in the Post Second World War Period (lodged on 10 September 2002) Janis Hughes*

S1M-3370 Paul Martin: Policy Advice on Glasgow in the Post Second World War Period—That the Parliament notes with concern the poor policy advice relating to Glasgow provided by Scottish Office advisers during the period after the second world war and calls on the Scottish Executive to take steps to ensure that the recommendations of the cities review will act as a means towards continuing to develop an ambitious and vibrant Glasgow. Supported by: Janis Hughes
S1M-3370 Policy Advice on Glasgow in the Post Second World War Period (lodged on 10 September 2002) Bill Butler*
S1M-3370 Policy Advice on Glasgow in the Post Second World War Period (lodged on 10 September 2002) Johann Lamont*
S1M-3370 Policy Advice on Glasgow in the Post Second World War Period (lodged on 10 September 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3370 Policy Advice on Glasgow in the Post Second World War Period (lodged on 10 September 2002) Pauline McNeill*
